title: Video: Avec Sans – Hold On
content: Returning with their first original material in seven months, UK duo Avec Sans (featuring 1/3 of Run Toto Run) are showing no signs of letting up. Another indie-disco floorfiller in waiting, Hold On isn’t quite the UK’s answer to Purity Ring like I originally predicted, and wanders a far more pop-orientated path, however there’s few electronic acts around at the moment writing with such confidence and ambition.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
